thread.section_title: Archive News & Video for Monday, 29 Jan 2018 | Reuters.com
thread.title: BRIEF-NV5 Secures $12 Mln In Environmental Compliance Contracts

author: Reuters Editorial
title: BRIEF-NV5 Secures $12 Mln In Environmental Compliance Contracts
text:
Jan 29 (Reuters) - NV5 Global Inc:
* NV5 AWARDED $12M IN ENVIRONMENTAL COMPLIANCE CONTRACTS ON 200 MILES OF NATURAL GAS PIPELINE PROJECTS IN MID-ATLANTIC STATES
* NV5 GLOBAL SAYS ‍IT WAS SELECTED BY TRANSCANADA CORP TO PROVIDE ENVIRONMENTAL INSPECTION, MANAGEMENT, COMPLIANCE SUPPORT SERVICES ON TWO MAJOR PROJECTS
* NV5 GLOBAL INC - ‍BOTH PROJECTS ARE REGULATED BY FEDERAL ENERGY REGULATORY COMMISSION (FERC) AND ARE SCHEDULED TO GO IN-SERVICE BY DECEMBER 1, 2018​ Source text for Eikon: Further company coverage:
